name: ISLAND
description: Characters from different eras have experienced different space teleportation, and finally arrived at this small island, as the beginning of the adventure. The initial island is an island surrounded by the sea, each character will be given different skills by the gods, we need to cooperate to overcome all difficulties , explore the entire island, defeat the monsters on the island to ensure safety, the final goal is to liberate the Boss on the altar and defeat it, and occupy the island.
